attributes.action: Reduce the amount of MPS ,stop paying their rent reduce their salary
attributes.background: Each mp is paid OVER 80,000 and the pm 100,000 it's disgusting and wrong on top of having 600mps when there is ONLY 48 counties.. on top of that rent is paid and expenses like private jets and fancy meals..

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Review the system of expenses and allowances for MPs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702821

Create state-owned housing for MPs to use
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/707155
